summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of NORTHEAST 127th STREET from 5th Avenue Northeast to 8th Avenue Northeast, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, ALSO, NORTHEAST 127th STREET from 5th Avenue Northeast to 8th Avenue Northeast, bypaving the same with three inches of asphaltic concrete on the existing street surface, Local Improvement District No. 6656 and appropriating money from the General Fund in aid thereof.
